In this first unit, we will review basic remote sensing concepts:

- Principles of remote sensing
- Remote sensing data acquisition
- Type of remote sensing systems
- Technical terms
- Various forms of remote sensing data
- The multi-concept
- Advantages and disadvantages
- Sources of data
